metadata.title: CVE-2017-9304 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: libyara/re.c in the regexp module in YARA 3.5.0 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (stack consumption) via a crafted rule that ismishandled in the _yr_re_emit function.

criterions.comment: yara: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
